description: I’m The Times’s theater editor. Here are five things I've been reading, watching and listening to.
title: What’s in Our Queue? Elena Ferrante and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? Elena Ferrante and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? Elena Ferrante and More Nicole Herrington In Harlem, in (and out) of theaters ��
I’m The Times’s theater editor.
I’ve been reading, watching and listening to a little bit of everything before the crowded spring theater season takes off.
Here are five favorites, including an Elena Ferrante novel and abstract art →
